query:
ALTER TABLE player_upgrades
  MODIFY COLUMN badgeName VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  MODIFY COLUMN fromLevel ENUM('none', 'bronze', 'silver', 'gold') NULL,
  MODIFY COLUMN toLevel ENUM('bronze', 'silver', 'gold') NULL,
  ADD COLUMN statName VARCHAR(50) NULL AFTER upgradeType,
  ADD COLUMN statIncrease INT NULL AFTER statName,
  ADD COLUMN newStatValue INT NULL AFTER statIncrease,
  ADD COLUMN metadata TEXT NULL AFTER requestId,
  ADD COLUMN createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL AFTER metadata;
